snippet: A former Marxist guerrilla leader and his conservative rival were in an unexpectedly tight race on Sunday in El Salvador's presidential election run-off with the race too close to call after results came in from over one-third of polling stations....

headline.print_headline: Ex-Rebel, Right-Wing Rival in Tight El Salvador Election
headline.main: Ex-Rebel, Right-Wing Rival in Tight El Salvador Election

lead_paragraph: A former Marxist guerrilla leader and his conservative rival were in an unexpectedly tight race on Sunday in El Salvador's presidential election run-off with the race too close to call after results came in from over one-third of polling stations.
